name: The Art of Song
description: Channel magic through music - healing, protection, destruction, and the fundamental harmonies of creation.
lore:
Before there were words, there was music. The universe was sung into being -
a grand harmony of creation that still echoes in all things. Those who learn
to hear this music can add their voices to it, shaping reality through
resonance and melody.

Song magic requires no arcane words or complex gestures - only voice, breath,
and the will to harmonize. It is perhaps the most natural of all magics,
accessible to anyone who can carry a tune. But mastery requires more than
talent: it requires understanding harmony and discord, learning the ancient
songs, and sometimes, singing together with others.

The greatest song mages can hear the World Song itself - the fundamental music
of creation. To sing along with that song is to touch the divine.

nodes.name: Music of the World
nodes.description: Learn to hear the music that underlies all things

effects.description: Sense the ambient music of places and things

nodes.lore:
Everything has a song - a tree, a river, a mountain. Most cannot hear it.
But for those with the gift, the world is alive with music: the deep bass
of stone, the high shimmer of sunlight, the complex harmonies of a forest.

nodes.name: Voice Awakening
nodes.description: Awaken the magical potential of your voice
nodes.lore:
Your voice is your first and most powerful instrument. Properly trained,
it can carry not just sound but intent, not just melody but magic.

nodes.name: Perfect Pitch
nodes.description: Develop precise control over pitch and tone
nodes.lore: Magic is particular about pitch. A song sung off-key may fail or worse - create unexpected discord. Perfect pitch ensures clean magic.

nodes.name: Breath of Power
nodes.description: Master breath control for sustained magical singing

effects.description: Sustain notes for extended magical effects

nodes.lore: The breath is life force made sound. Control the breath, and you control the flow of power through your songs.

nodes.name: Harmonic Resonance
nodes.description: Learn to sing in harmony with the world's music
nodes.lore:
When your song aligns with the existing harmonies of the world,
effects are amplified. This is the foundation of all constructive song magic.

nodes.name: Songs of Mending
nodes.description: Learn the songs that mend body and spirit

effects.description: Can learn and sing healing songs

unlockConditions.description: Must learn your first healing melody

nodes.lore:
The oldest songs are healing songs - mother's lullabies, chants over
the sick, hymns for the wounded. Learn these melodies and your voice
becomes medicine.

nodes.name: Songs of Protection
nodes.description: Learn songs that create barriers and wards

effects.description: Can learn and sing protective songs

nodes.lore: A mother's lullaby wards off nightmares. A marching song strengthens resolve. These are the warding songs - protection through harmony.

nodes.name: Songs of Growth
nodes.description: Learn songs that encourage life and growth

effects.description: Can learn and sing songs of growth

nodes.lore:
Farmers have always sung to their crops. There is truth in it - plants
respond to certain frequencies. Master these songs and you can coax
growth from barren soil.

nodes.name: Dissonance
nodes.description: Learn to create controlled discord

effects.description: +X% resistance to discord effects on self

nodes.lore:
Discord is not evil - it is change, disruption, the breaking of stasis.
Sometimes harmony must be broken before a new harmony can emerge. But
discord is dangerous; it can consume the singer.

nodes.name: Songs of Shattering
nodes.description: Learn the songs that break and shatter

effects.description: Can learn songs that shatter and destroy

nodes.lore:
The right pitch can shatter glass. The right song can shatter stone,
chains, even magical bonds. These are the songs of breaking - crude but
powerful.

nodes.name: Songs of Silence
nodes.description: Learn to sing silence itself
nodes.lore:
Paradoxical: a song of silence. But silence is not the absence of sound -
it is the presence of perfect stillness. Master singers can impose this
stillness on an area, negating all sound-based magic within.

nodes.name: Instrument Attunement
nodes.description: Learn to channel magic through instruments
nodes.lore:
While the voice is the purest instrument, constructed instruments
offer capabilities beyond the human body - greater range, sustained notes,
multiple simultaneous tones.

nodes.name: String Mastery
nodes.description: Master string instruments for emotional magic
nodes.lore:
Strings vibrate in sympathy with the human heart. A skilled player can
pluck emotions as easily as strings - drawing out sorrow, inspiring joy,
kindling love or rage.

nodes.name: Wind Mastery
nodes.description: Master wind instruments for breath-spirit magic
nodes.lore:
Wind instruments carry the breath - and breath is spirit. Play a flute
and you breathe your life force into the music. This makes wind magic
personal and powerful, but also draining.

nodes.name: Percussion Mastery
nodes.description: Master percussion for rhythm-based magic
nodes.lore:
The drum is the heartbeat of magic. Rhythm entrains the mind, synchronizes
groups, and creates patterns that magic flows along. A master drummer
controls the very tempo of reality.

nodes.name: Duet Harmony
nodes.description: Learn to harmonize magically with one other singer

effects.description: Can harmonize effectively with one other

unlockConditions.description: Must practice with a harmonizing partner

nodes.lore:
When two voices join in harmony, the magic is more than doubled. But
harmonizing requires trust and practice - your magic must blend with
another's without conflict.

nodes.name: Choir Power
nodes.description: Lead a choir in magical song
nodes.lore:
A single voice is a stream; a choir is an ocean. When many voices unite
in harmony, they can achieve effects impossible for any individual - moving
mountains, calming storms, healing plagues.

nodes.name: Master Conductor
nodes.description: Lead magical ensembles without singing yourself
nodes.lore:
The conductor does not sing - they shape the singing of others. Through
gesture, intent, and will, they weave individual voices into a single
magical instrument of immense power.

nodes.name: Songs of Calling
nodes.description: Learn songs that call beings or things to you

effects.description: Can learn songs that call and summon

nodes.name: Songs of Lament
nodes.description: Learn the songs of mourning that move hearts

effects.description: Can learn songs of mourning and loss

nodes.lore:
Laments are songs of loss - but also songs of power. A true lament can
make the hardest heart weep, can honor the dead so deeply that their
spirits stir, can channel grief into purpose.

nodes.name: Songs of Passage
nodes.description: Learn the songs that ease death and honor the dead

effects.description: Can learn songs for death and the dead

unlockConditions.description: Must have sung at a death vigil

nodes.lore:
The greatest singers know the songs of passage - melodies that ease
the dying, hymns that honor the dead, chants that ensure spirits find
their way. These songs walk the border between life and death.

nodes.name: Words of Power
nodes.description: Concentrate an entire song into a single word of power

effects.description: Concentrate a song into a single word

nodes.lore:
Masters learn to compress - to take an entire song and fold it into a
single syllable of absolute power. These words can stop hearts, shatter
walls, or heal mortal wounds - but each use drains the singer utterly.

nodes.name: The World Song
nodes.description: Hear the fundamental song of creation itself

effects.description: Hear the fundamental music of creation

nodes.lore:
Beyond all individual songs lies the World Song - the harmony of creation
itself, the music that was sung before time began. To hear even a fragment
is to understand the universe in a way no other magic allows.

xpSources.description: Achieve perfect harmony with another singer
Hear a fragment of the world song
